body:
@LemonadeElephant
But even though it is a mistake she still enjoy it more than necessary... not that i hate it though. i think it is amazing
I guess it's an easy mistake to make.

In conclusion i like the transition of this doujin as it turn from she shows disinterest and turn into serious mating between male and female, also the intimacy that the two shown during the sex, it doesn't feels like two stranger having sex, it feels like two really intimate people that have feeling with each other.

The overall feeling of this doujin give the feeling of consensual sex than cheating, however, with cheating in the context, this doujin actually felt a little bit NTR because throughout the sex she looks like she have feeling for him.

Secondly, is because from page 7 onward she treat him quite intimately instead of a tools she used to relief her lust. From the time she taught him cunnilingus and how she said she is ready to accept his penis, as if she is ready to accept him wholeheartedly as well. The intimacy escalates even more when penetration happen she holds hand with him while her wedding ring is jutting out as if the author try to imply that right now her wedding is eclipsed by her affair she is having currently. On page 13 as i mentioned previously, she looks like she is seeing someone really precious to her and the <3 symbol on the background amplified the feeling even more. At the scene before creampie on page 16 her body truly want his sperm judging by how tight her pussy squeezes him, showing how good she felt, and most importantly she KISSED him, on many cheating doujin the female usually refuses kiss because it will truly be crossing the line, but here she kiss him willingly and even beg for his sperm.

Yep this is definitely cheating, there should have been cheating tag for this

I think i like this doujin since it is different from most cheating doujin. Firstly, I like the transition of this doujin as you can see from the first few pages she saw it as simply a chore going by her sighing and scolding him showing her disinterest toward him, however, when it reach the paizuri scene you can see that her face turn quite slutty meaning her initial disinterest has slowly eroded and replaced with lust, and that pose on page 7 is definitely erotic as if she is an embodiment of lust itself. Starting from page 13 onward you could see that she start seeing him as a male, and the face she shown at the bottom panel looks as if she is looking at someone really precious to her. Now this is the transition that i mentioned previously she only saw him as duty then lust reliever and then finally as a mating partner between male and female.
And they say perfection doesn't exist...
See ring on her left-ring finger...Hold on, isn't that cheating!? (Not like i complain, mind you.)
